name: (Mod)packing the sandbox: Design & Extensible Games
description: History rhymes and when all is said and done DAOs and early modding communities will likely be seen as predecessors to tomorrows Autonomous Worlds. Weâ€™ll dive in to examine the challenges of distributed authorship, the tools we have available, and speak to it from a design perspective.

speakers.name: Calvin Dunwoody
speakers.bio: Click_save is the Design Lead at Cartridge, a NYC based company building gaming infrastructure on Starknet & onchain games themselves with Dojo.
